lyric.verse: Anata wa tondemo naku Yasuragi no hito datta Hitori de aruku koto mo Mama naranai hosoi ashi Ookina hitomi wo Fuchidoru nagai matsuge
lyric.chorus: Hikoukigumo wo Oikakeru watashi to Sora wo mimamoru Anata ga ita fuyu wa So far away ...
lyric.verse: Kirei na oningyou mo Hoshikatta omocha mo Anata wa motteta noni Tsutsumigami sono mama de Mou sugu sora e to Tobidatsu koto shitteta?
lyric.chorus: Hikoukigumo wo Oikoshite anata wa Dare yori takaku Tonde yukeru hazu yo So far away...
lyric.verse: Saigou ni sono me ga Miteita mono wa naani?
lyric.chorus: Hikoukigumo wo Oikakeru watashi to Sora wo mimamoru Anata ga ita fuyu wa So far away ...

lyric.verse: You were the absolute center of calm for me Your unsteady fawn legs Your long eyelashes Shadowing doe eyes ...
lyric.chorus: I was chasing the jet trails And you watched me tenderly That winter went So far away
lyric.verse: You had the beautiful doll And that toy that I really wanted Even with the wrapping unopened Did you know you that you were about to fly up to that sky?
lyric.chorus: You will leave that jet trail behind And fly even higher than anybody else Fly so far away ...
lyric.verse: What was the last thing Those eyes were looking at?
